plays.text: Penalty to Marcus Ragnarsson 2 minutes for Holding Luc Robitaille
Penalty to Fredrik Olausson 2 minutes for Hooking Marco Sturm
Penalty to Brett Hull 2 minutes for Hooking Teemu Selanne
Penalty to Shawn Heins 2 minutes for Crosschecking Brett Hull
Penalty to Todd Harvey 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Dominik Hasek
Penalty to Gary Suter 2 minutes for Interference Kris Draper
Penalty to Igor Larionov 2 minutes for Tripping Scott Hannan
Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Interference Niklas Sundstrom
Goal scored by Scott Thornton assisted by Mike Ricci and Niklas Sundstrom
Penalty to Todd Harvey 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Todd Harvey 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for High Sticking Bryan Marchment
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Interference Brad Stuart
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Chris Chelios
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Slashing Mike Ricci
Penalty to Mike Ricci 2 minutes for High Sticking Boyd Devereaux
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Nicklas Lidstrom
Goal scored by Brett Hull assisted by Kirk Maltby and Steve Yzerman
Goal scored by Stephane Matteau assisted by Vincent Damphousse and Bryan Marchment
Goal scored by Todd Harvey assisted by Patrick Marleau
Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Crosschecking Owen Nolan
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan unassisted
